Instruction: Heat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).
Drain any remaining liquid from the shredded potatoes, zucchini, carrots, and onions, then transfer the vegetables to a large bowl.
Combine eggs, flour, canola oil, salt, and black pepper with the vegetable mixture, ensuring they are thoroughly mixed, then transfer the mixture to a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown and crisp, approximately 60 minutes.
